326510.name: Screencheat - Deluxe Edition Upgrade (Soundtrack + Ragdolls)
326510.description:
The Deluxe Edtion DLC includes the complete Screencheat soundtrack as well as 5 unique in game Ragdolls to choose from.
  • Skeleton
  • Raptor
  • Deep Diver
  • Giraffe
  • Elephant

About the Soundtrack

This soundtrack features 1h 04m of electronic music composed and produced by Psilatron featuring a rich mixture of vintage and contemporary synth sounds combined with classic drum samples and energetic beats resulting in a unique musical experience which is out of this world.

Mixed by legendary EDM studio engineer Danny Bonnici.

The Screencheat OST is available in 24-Bit 48kHz FLAC and MP3 320 kbps formats.

Tracklist:
01 – Chasing the Dragon
02 – Zeroth Estate of the Realm
03 – Panopticon
04 – Drone Strike
05 – Suffer Then Die
06 – Trapped in Samsara
07 – Guru Meditation
08 – Grot Away
09 – Midnight Escape
10 – Supreme Dojo Shadowmaster (Bonus Track)
11 – The Phantom Horde (Bonus Track)
12 – Komuso Ninja (Bonus Track)
13 – Hivemind Apocalypse (Bonus Track)
14 – Eternal Gladiator (Bonus Track)

英语*
